fixed_skill.desc: Restore 1 ally's HP by 38.0/39.9/41.8% of Attack + 1150/1423/1716.
fixed_skill.name: Diarahan

innate_skill.desc: Cure Confuse, Fear, Despair, Rage, or Brainwash on 1 ally.
innate_skill.name: Energy Drop

innate_skill.desc: Increase party's Defense by 16.3%/17.1%/17.9%. For every 500 of the user's Defense, increase party's Defense by 2.7%/2.8%/3.0% more, up to 10.8%/11.3%/11.9%. Lasts for 3 turns.
innate_skill.name: Marakukaja

passive_skill.desc: Increase healing by 17.8%. When healing with a skill, increase target's ailment accuracy and ailment resistance by 10% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Dragon's Protection

passive_skill.desc: Increase healing by 17.8%. When healing with a skill, increase target's ailment accuracy and ailment resistance by 11% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Dragon's Protection I

passive_skill.desc: Increase healing by 17.8%. When healing with a skill, increase target's ailment accuracy and ailment resistance by 12% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Dragon's Protection II

passive_skill.desc: Increase healing by 17.8%. When healing with a skill, increase target's ailment accuracy and ailment resistance by 13% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Dragon's Protection III

showtime_skill.desc: Restore HP to party equal to 48.6%/52.0%/55.4% Attack + 1471/1854/2275.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
